column2: "Ooh, are you here to become a better Ranger? Well, are you?"
"Well that's just wonderful! Let me be the one to file your performance report!"
"So, here's the deal. Do your Ranger thing with the weapon I choose and take out the target hostiles, okay?"
"Of course, it's not my fault if you get killed. Just go for the kill without getting yourself killed. Simply kill, kill, kill and you'll do fine!"
"Okay, okay, okay. I hope you come back a hero instead of in a body bag. I'll be waiting right here, soâ€¦ GO!"
